experience.experience_title: Develop, maintain, and optimize websites using HTML, CSS, React, JavaScript, and Python.
Integrate back-end services, ensuring data flow between front-end and databases.
Write efficient, well-designed, and testable code following best practices.
Collaborate with designers to match visual designs with functionality.
Scale and expand website features based on evolving user needs.
Stay current with industry trends and implement new technologies as appropriate.
